verses.plain: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage.

tokens.t: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage.

verses.plain: Behold, I Paul say unto you, that if ye be circumcised, Christ shall profit you nothing.

tokens.t: Behold, I Paul say unto you, that if ye be circumcised, Christ shall profit you nothing.

verses.plain: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised, that he is a debtor to do the whole law.

tokens.t: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised, that he is a debtor to do the whole law.

verses.plain: Christ is become of no effect unto you, whosoever of you are justified by the law; ye are fallen from grace.

tokens.t: Christ is become of no effect unto you, whosoever of you are justified by the law; ye are fallen from grace.

verses.plain: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith.

tokens.t: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith.

verses.plain: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision; but faith which worketh by love.

tokens.t: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision; but faith which worketh by love.

verses.plain: Ye did run well; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth?

tokens.t: Ye did run well; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth?

verses.plain: This persuasion cometh not of him that calleth you.

tokens.t: This persuasion
not of him that calleth you.

verses.plain: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump.

tokens.t: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump.

verses.plain: I have confidence in you through the Lord, that ye will be none otherwise minded: but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment, whosoever he be.

tokens.t: I have confidence in you through the Lord, that ye will be none otherwise minded: but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment, whosoever he be.

verses.plain: And I, brethren, if I yet preach circumcision, why do I yet suffer persecution? then is the offence of the cross ceased.

tokens.t: And I, brethren, if I yet preach circumcision, why do I yet suffer persecution? then is the offence of the cross ceased.

verses.plain: I would they were even cut off which trouble you.

tokens.t: I would they were even cut off which trouble you.

verses.plain: For, brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another.

tokens.t: For, brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only
not liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another.

verses.plain: For all the law is fulfilled in one word, even in this; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.

tokens.t: For all the law is fulfilled in one word,
in this; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.

verses.plain: But if ye bite and devour one another, take heed that ye be not consumed one of another.

tokens.t: But if ye bite and devour one another, take heed that ye be not consumed one of another.

verses.plain: This I say then, Walk in the Spirit, and ye shall not fulfil the lust of the flesh.

tokens.t: I say then, Walk in the Spirit, and ye shall not fulfil the lust of the flesh.

verses.plain: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh: and these are contrary the one to the other: so that ye cannot do the things that ye would.

tokens.t: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh: and these are contrary the one to the other: so that ye cannot do the things that ye would.

verses.plain: But if ye be led of the Spirit, ye are not under the law.

tokens.t: But if ye be led of the Spirit, ye are not under the law.

verses.plain: Now the works of the flesh are manifest, which are these; Adultery, fornication, uncleanness, lasciviousness,

tokens.t: Now the works of the flesh are manifest, which are
; Adultery, fornication, uncleanness, lasciviousness,

verses.plain: Idolatry, witchcraft, hatred, variance, emulations, wrath, strife, seditions, heresies,

tokens.t: Idolatry, witchcraft, hatred, variance, emulations, wrath, strife, seditions, heresies,

verses.plain: Envyings, murders, drunkenness, revellings, and such like: of the which I tell you before, as I have also told you in time past, that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God.

tokens.t: Envyings, murders, drunkenness, revellings, and such like: of the which I tell you before, as I have also told
in time past, that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God.

verses.plain: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,

tokens.t: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,

verses.plain: Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.

tokens.t: Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.

verses.plain: And they that are Christ’s have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts.

tokens.t: And they that are Christ’s have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts.

verses.plain: If we live in the Spirit, let us also walk in the Spirit.

tokens.t: If we live in the Spirit, let us also walk in the Spirit.

verses.plain: Let us not be desirous of vain glory, provoking one another, envying one another.

tokens.t: Let us not be desirous of vain glory, provoking one another, envying one another.
